name: KaptureHome
0: ”Alexa, ask kapture home to close the front door with code nine four eight seven”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kapture home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa allows you to:

- lock/unlock your door by corrected lock name from anywhere.
- Receive notifications when your Kapture Smart Lock is being operated.
- Always know if the door is locked or unlocked.
- Receive notifications when the keyhole cover has been tampered.
